EXTRACTED VALUE: The ultimate racing game for fans of slowburning, ultra detailed motoring... a bit joyless for everyone else. [Aug 2007, p.78]
It shows what the console can do by looking absolutely gorgeous where some other games have failed miserably to do so.
The controls are simple, the graphics pretty, and the game fluffy enough to forgive its essential repetitiveness.
The best bits will match any adrenaline high a game's ever given you. [Mar 2008, p.62]
